subject: Football (College)
Hawaii Bowl (College Football)
lead_paragraph: Despite squandering nearly all of a 35-point lead and giving up an improbable touchdown on the final play from scrimmage, Western Kentucky topped Central Michigan in the Bahamas Bowl in Nassau, the first bowl game outside the United States or Canada since 1937.
snippet: Despite squandering nearly all of a 35-point lead and giving up an improbable touchdown on the final play from scrimmage, Western Kentucky topped Central Michigan in the Bahamas Bowl in Nassau, the first bowl game outside the United States or Canada...
